metadata.name: Heartache
metadata.description:
Desolate embrace
Heartache's chill seeps through the cracks
Love's warmth, a memory

--

This piece was created using an iterative back-and-forth process capturing and curating raw synthographs using very specific prompt engineering techniques on custom and pre-trained (Midjourney, Stable Diffusion) AI models.

It was further refined using Photoshop to experiment with colors and compositions, to paint over, collage or mask initial images in order to accentuate or reveal the stylistic aspects of the main subject I have chosen.
